recruitmentIntro.text: Alright, I'm here. The intel says the target is just past this station.
I wonder where the squad is...
Oh wait, I think I can see some friendlies up there.

recruits.name: Scout
recruits.dialogue: Hey, Commander! I got deployed here too, do you want me on your squad? We've been working together since forever, heh.
recruits.removeDialogue: You want me to stand down? Alright, Commander. I'll be on standby.
recruits.partyFullDialogue: Looks like your squad is full. If a spot opens up, you know who to call.
recruits.bio: A swift operative specializing in reconnaissance and exploiting weaknesses. He has been a valuable asset in previous missions, notably his accomplishments in Totality Tower and Bathroom Approach.

recruits.name: Toxic Gunner
recruits.dialogue: It's been a while since I was last on a missionâ€”do not fret, Commander. I still got it.
recruits.removeDialogue: Got changes? I'll pack up my chemicals if so. Let me know if you change your mind.
recruits.partyFullDialogue: No room for me? What a pity, I really want to try out my new concoctions.
recruits.bio: A specialist in debilitating toxins and firearms. Can sacrifice his mental well-being to gain tactical advantages for the squad.

recruits.name: Pyromancer
recruits.dialogue: Commander! Did you miss me? I certainly missed our barbeque parties. Anyway, give me a chance to light things up, you won't be disappointed!
recruits.removeDialogue: What? Not bringing me along? Fine, more fire for me later, I guess.
recruits.partyFullDialogue: The party's already lit without me? Hard to believe. Let me know if you need more firepower.
recruits.bio: A pyrotechnics specialist who can charge up to unleash devastating area-of-effect fire attacks. He is widely known for his help in the Bathroom Approach mission, playing a big role in defeating Nerd Duck's forces.

recruits.name: Sledger
recruits.dialogue: If you need a wall, I'm your wall. If you need something broken, I'm your hammer.
recruits.removeDialogue: Was that too corny, Commander? Well, it's your call.
recruits.partyFullDialogue: The line-up looks solid already. I'll be here if you need some heavy-duty backup.
recruits.bio: A resilient vanguard who excels at defense. Can shield allies and disrupt foes with powerful ice-based attacks.
